fidelity._comment: Add new accounts as discovered. Use last 4 digits of account number as key.

bank_of_america._comment: BoA accounts will be added here as we process them

suntrust._comment: SunTrust accounts will be added here as we process them

_instructions.usage: Maps account number endings to human-readable labels for filename generation
_instructions.format: Institution name (lowercase) -> last 4 digits -> short label

examples.unknown_account: Falls back to Fid_Stmnt_2025-08_9999.pdf and prompts to update mapping
